info1.title: Test Your approximate number sense!
info1.first:
Now the instruction starts, be ready! 
 Press Space Bar to continue
info1.second:
In this test you will see a random number of colored shapes on screen for 1000 milliseconds (1 second).
 Your job is to decide whether there are more objects on the right side or on the left side of the window.
info1.third:
Your task is to be both fast and accurate 
 The images will be shown for one second, if you feel that you can answer before that, you are allowed to do it.
info1.fourth: The instruction is now terminated. When you press the space bar the experiment will begun.

endText:
The experiment is terminated 
 Thank you for your participation!
ready: Press the space bar when you are ready for the next one
instruction1:
Press the left arrow if the numerosity on the left is greater 
 Press the right arrow if the numerosity on the right is greater
